revised_title: Royal Society Anniversary Address and Royal Medals
tldr: The Duke of Sussex delivered an address at the Royal Society's anniversary meeting, discussing the history of the Royal Society's annual grants and the recipients of the Royal Medals. He also expressed his gratitude for the support and cooperation he has received during his tenure as president and emphasized the importance of promoting science and technology for the nation's progress.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > History of Science
